org.enhydra.shark.api.internal.deadlinehandler

Interface DeadlineHandler


  • public interface DeadlineHandler
    Handles activity deadlines in the case XPDL exception transition is not defined.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(CallbackUtilities cus)
      Method configure is called at Shark start up, to configure implementation of DeadlineHandler.
      void handleDeadline(WMSessionHandle shandle, WfActivityInternal act, java.lang.String exceptionName) 

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(CallbackUtilities cus)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Method configure is called at Shark start up, to configure implementation of DeadlineHandler.
        Parameters:
        cus - an instance of CallbackUtilities used to get properties for configuring deadline handler in Shark.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if configuring doesn't succeed.

      • handleDeadline

        void handleDeadline(WMSessionHandle shandle,
                  WfActivityInternal act,
                  java.lang.String exceptionName)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        shandle -
        act - WfActivityInternal object where the deadline happened.
        exceptionName - The name of exception for the deadline that is handled.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the case something unexpected happens
